src:
Round-Up 5 Berita Terpopuler
Blak-blakan Wamen ATR Surya Tjandra, Sofyan Basir Divonis Bebas
04 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Tim detikcom


Sofyan Basir tinggalkan rutan KPK/Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Berita terpopuler detikFinance Senin (4/11/2019) adalah tentang Wakil Menteri (Wamen) Agraria dan Tata Ruang, Surya Tjandra. Lewat wawancara khusus bersama detikcom, Surya blak-blakan perjalannya dari seorang pengacara yang memperjuangkan hak-hak buruh hingga dipilih Presiden Joko Widodo menjadi Wamen.Selain soal perjalanan Surya Tjandra, berita terpopuler lainnya soal bocoran peluang Sofyan Basir balik lagi menjadi Dirut PLN. Seperti diketahui bersama, Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi memvonis bebas Sofyan Basir dari tuduhan terlibat kasus suap dalam proyek PLTU Riau I.Mau tahu informasi selengkapnya? Baca 5 berit terpopuler detikFinance berikut ini: (hns/hns)
text:
Round-Up of 5 Most Popular News
Bluntly, ATR Wamen Surya Tjandra, Sofyan Basir Sentenced Free
Nov 04 2019, 2:00 PM by Tim detikcom


Sofyan Basir leaves KPK detention center / Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - detikFinance most popular news Monday (11/04/2019) is about the Deputy Minister (Deputy Minister) of Agrarian and Spatial Planning, Surya Tjandra. Through a special interview with detikcom, Surya was outspoken in his journey from a lawyer who fought for labor rights until President Joko Widodo was elected as Deputy Minister. Aside from Surya Tjandra's trip, other popular news about leaked opportunities was Sofyan Basir turning back into PLN's Managing Director. As is well known, the Corruption Court has convicted Sofyan Basir of being accused of being involved in a bribery case in the Riau PLTU project. Do you want to know more information? Read the 5 most popular detikFinance news below: (hns / hns)
